articles.full_text: (CAPITOL CITY NOW) – Gov. JB Pritzker Tuesday afternoon accused the Trump administration of racism in deploying the National Guard to patrol Chicago ...
articles.summary: (CAPITOL CITY NOW) – Gov. JB Pritzker Tuesday afternoon accused the Trump administration of racism in deploying the National Guard to patrol Chicago . .

articles.title: Inside Britain's Working-Class Uprising - The Free Press
articles.full_text: “Racists,” some shouted at the little people. Well, they're uneducated oiks who like to wave the flag of their country—they must be racist, right?
articles.summary: “Racists,” some shouted at the little people. Well, they're uneducated oiks who like to wave the flag of their country—they must be racist, right?.
